about_the_game:
If you enjoyed playing my game The Savior From Above and would like to support this and future game projects, you can do so by purchasing a Donation DLC.

In appreciation of your support, you’ll receive the game’s digital artbook, with 60+ exclusive images: mid-development and early game screenshots, original sketches, paintings and more. The package also containes the three original music tracks from the game.

All three Donation DLC package include the exact same content. You can name your price by choosing the Silver, Gold or Diamond tier of donation. The files will be downloaded to your game folder upon updating.

Thank you for your support!
